concept.title: Shell Shocked Splashdown
concept.description: Help brave sea turtles navigate treacherous waters and return to their nesting beaches in this fast-paced, top-down 2D action game. Dash, dodge, and dive through vibrant environments filled with dangers and discover the joy of returning home.
concept.objective: Guide a determined sea turtle through three distinct levels to reach its ancestral nesting beach, overcoming obstacles and protecting its journey.
mechanics: Fast-paced WASD movement with a satisfying 'dash' ability
Environmental hazard avoidance (currents, sharp coral, predators)
Collectibles scattered throughout levels to increase score and unlock abilities
player_abilities: Dash: A quick burst of speed in any direction, allowing for dodging and rapid traversal.
Shell Tuck: Briefly become invulnerable and resistant to currents by tucking into its shell.
Sonar Pulse (Unlocked later): Emits a short-range pulse to reveal hidden paths and nearby threats.

enemies.name: Pufferfish Barrage
enemies.behavior: Swells up and shoots out spines in a burst when the player gets close. Moves erratically.

enemies.name: Jellyfish Swarm
enemies.behavior: Drifts in predictable patterns, delivering a mild shock on contact. Can be difficult to navigate through in large numbers.

enemies.name: Shark Patrol
enemies.behavior: Patrols a set area, lunging at the player if they get within its sight. Fast and aggressive.

powerups.name: Kelp Boost
powerups.effect: Temporarily increases movement speed and dash distance.

powerups.name: Pearls of Wisdom
powerups.effect: Grants a temporary shield that absorbs one hit from an enemy or hazard.

concept.level_progression: The game features three levels, each representing a stage of the turtle's journey: 1. Sandy Shores (Beach), 2. Coral Currents (Ocean Depths), 3. Return to the Nest (Returning Beach). Each level introduces new environmental challenges and enemy types.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for collecting seashells, completing levels quickly, avoiding damage, and successfully navigating hazardous sections. Bonus points are given for reaching specific checkpoints.
concept.visual_style: Vibrant, stylized 2D pixel art with smooth animations. The beach levels feature warm, sandy tones and lush vegetation, while the ocean levels are characterized by shimmering blues, greens, and bioluminescent flora. Player and enemy sprites are expressive and distinct.
concept.sound_theme: Upbeat and tropical soundtrack with energetic melodies for the beach and more mysterious, atmospheric tunes for the ocean. Satisfying sound effects for dashing, collecting items, and encountering enemies, with a triumphant theme for completing levels.

level_design.name: The Sunken Garden
level_design.description: Begin your aquatic adventure in a calm, sun-dappled coral garden. Learn the ropes with gentle currents and easily avoidable obstacles, but watch out for curious, slow-moving reef dwellers.

assets.player: A small, round, cartoonish crab with bright red shell and large, expressive white eyes on stalks. Wears tiny blue swimming goggles.

enemies.basic: A simple, slow-moving jellyfish. Translucent pink body with a few dangling, thin, light-blue tentacles.
enemies.aggressive: A spiky, dark green sea urchin with a menacing grin and sharp, short, dark purple spikes pointing outwards.

powerups.health: A glistening, pink heart icon with a faint white glow.
powerups.speed: A stylized, swirling wind gust icon in light blue and white.

obstacles.wall: A solid, brown pixel block representing a sea wall or driftwood.
obstacles.rock: A jagged, grey pixel shape with darker grey shading to indicate texture.

assets.background: A layered scene with a sandy beach in the foreground (warm beige pixels) transitioning to shimmering blue-green ocean water. Sparse green palm fronds and bright yellow flowers dot the beach. In the ocean, glowing teal and purple shapes represent bioluminescent plants.

ui_elements.score: White pixel numbers displayed on a dark background, typically top-left corner.
ui_elements.health_bar: A horizontal bar, starting green at full health and turning red as it depletes. Has a small white outline.
